title: Buffer and Sample Distribution
author: Opentrons
process:
Transfer 20uL of buffer (first row of trough) to rows with sample (1-4) on plate 1
Transfer 2uL of each sample row (1-4) on plate1 to 3 rows of each on plate 2.
Mix 5 times.

markdown.title: Buffer and Sample Distribution
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.process:
1. Transfer 20uL of buffer (first row of trough) to rows with sample (1-4) on plate 1
2. Transfer 2uL of each sample row (1-4) on plate1 to 3 rows of each on plate 2.
3. Mix 5 times.
